reporter_caption.center: BAIN v. GLOBE LAUNDRY CO., 245 Ill. App. 627 (1927)

caption.center: Lewis A. Bain, trading as L.A. Bain Company, complainant and appellee, v.
Globe Laundry Company et al., defendants, on appeal of Globe Laundry

court.center: Appellate Court of Illinois, First District.

opinion.posture:
Mechanic's lien proceedings. Decree for complainant.
Appeal from the Circuit Court of Cook county; the Hon. Ira Ryner, Judge, presiding. Heard in the second division of this court for the first district at the October term, 1926.
opinion.attorneys: Zillman Krinker, for appellant. Clithero, Osborn Stevens, for appellee.
opinion.opinion_byline: Mr. Justice Gridley delivered the opinion of the court.
